content.rendered:
We all want to decorate our house in the best possible manner so that it looks interesting to others. Decor Enterprise is one such superb concern whose existence in this sphere is a genuine gift to the patrons. We offer the most excellent quality of false ceiling, decorative ceiling and gypsum board designs in Kolkata according to the tastes and needs of our clients. The solutions that we are offering to our patrons are accessible in several shapes, colors, thickness, and colors.  No wonder, you will find that our finishing is the best and you will surely be satisfied with our services.

We are a professionally managed concern and possess a powerful network of dealers all across the country. Our services started in the year 2004 and until now, we have marked a status in the marketplace because of our comprehensive knowledge and expertise. We offer an extensive variety of False Ceiling, Gypsum Board Partitions, False Ceiling Materials, Metal False Ceiling, False Ceiling Accessories, and lot more to our patrons.

Our matchless qualities of products or services have actually won superb reputation amongst our regular patrons. The pricing that we are offering to our patrons is also quite minimal and can be managed to pay by middle and elite class people. Our main motto is to offer durable and hard-wearing products so that it performs well and is in demand amongst our various patrons. Our quality of resolution will be worth the money spent by you. You can us trust us completely as we are here to provide you with trustworthy and reliable resolution of the particular aspect which cannot be completed by someone else in the market.

Our Infrastructure

We have experienced human resources who are capable to provide you with all possible projects at stipulated time period. Moreover, our highly advanced unit spreads over an extensive area. Our warehouse has highly developed facilities, which assist in rendering excellent range of products to the patrons.

Quality Mantra

Our gypsum false ceiling designs will spice your home or office with interesting patterns and styles, thereby proving an aesthetic look and feel. In addition, it is light-weight, moisture resistant and decrease condensation. The gypsum board can be suspended from the main ceiling. We also have well equipped team who assists in installation service and offering exclusive designing.

Our Vendor Base

Our vendor base is quite huge. We acquire raw products from outstanding quality of vendors as they assure about their quality at competitive pricing.

WHY DO FALSE CEILING’S

False Ceiling design’s are one of the most important part of your home as they offer the maximum unobstructed view of any interior space. False ceilings can lend a definitive look and feel to your rooms and help you create a unique ambience. Besides transforming the aesthetics of a room, false ceilings offer immense functional benefits that translate into better lit, cooler, quieter and more energy efficient rooms.
